entry.title: Vim
entry.summary:
Vi IMproved’s Learning Session

VIM’s help file is the main source of knowledge about VIM and his functionalities. This newsletter let you learn this awesome text-editor throughout daily or weekly email.

Each email has these sections:

  • Theory: a portion of the official manual;
  • Practice: questions or exercises that help you in the learning process;
  • Help: answers or examples to the previous section.

See an email preview!

Subscription
